title: Experience Event - Proposition Interactions
description: Captures information regarding an action taken for one or more prior propositions. Each decision has a unique ID that is sent back with an experience event. The decision is assumed to have contributed to the experience event and is now associated with it.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Involved Propositions
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: An array of decision propositions that contributed to the experience event. The experience event is attributed (at least partially) to those prior decisions/propositions. An individual profile's proposition-response history is maintained with these decision identifiers.
